doc:
Joe Rock https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Rock 0 Joe Rock (December 25, 1893 – December 5, 1984) was an American movie producer, director, actor, and screenwriter best remembered today for producing a series of 12 two reel comedies starring Stan Laurel in the 1920s. After infantry service in World War I, Rock began his film career as a comedian in silent films working under his real name, Joe Simburg — he had a broad grin and protruding ears, which gave him a comical appearance – but soon found greater success as a producer. Joe_Rock ( December_25_,_1893 – December_5_,_1984 ) was an_American_movie_producer , director , actor , and screenwriter best remembered today for producing a_series of 12_two_reel_comedies starring Stan_Laurel in the_1920s . After infantry_service in World_War_I , Rock began his_film_career as a_comedian in silent_films working under his_real_name , Joe_Simburg — he had a_broad_grin and protruding ears , which gave him a_comical_appearance – but soon_found greater_success as a_producer .
